title: Could we adjust the height of the solar array box

content.raw:
The attached picture represents Valyrie positioned in the optimal place to grab the cable, with a 35 degree pelvis lean (the maximum that seems to hold without the controller falling over), and the arm at max extension.

As you can see, the fingers don't quite reach the cable ends.

We could turn sideways to the table, but that is really starting to feel ridiculous.

The height of the table inside task 3 is higher than the solar box in two ways; first, in raw height, and then second, because it is on the same level as Valkyrie, it is effectively higher by the height of the step.
